description: Convert a JSON file, JSON from a file path, or a JSON string to a Data object or a list of Data objects

inputs.name: json_file
inputs.info: Upload a JSON file to convert to a Data object or list of Data objects

inputs.name: json_path
inputs.info: Provide the path to the JSON file as pure text

inputs.name: json_string
inputs.info: Enter a valid JSON string (object or array) to convert to a Data object or list of Data objects
